:::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare

Ramjet: Im sorry, but i know of no other other base.
Falcon: But i do!
Snare: What are you talking about brother?
Falcon: The ruined Neocon base!
Snare: the key word there is ruined.
Skywarp: Wait, Falcon has a point. All of us together could be able to fix it 
up-
Dirge: And regain power for when Magmatron returns! Sounds great!
::Ramjet turns to Cygnar, Like-Like, and Neody::
Ramjet: The Neocon base is in Syria.  We all can fly. Any of you three who 
cant fly can go inside Falcon and Snare. What do you say?

--part1_35.119f1f0e.27d648a9_boundary
